sentences.en: A telephone was ringing in the darkness - tinny, unfamiliar ring.
sentences.cn: 电话铃声在黑暗中响起 - 一阵微弱 、 不熟悉的声响.

sentences.en: A tinny music trickled from the telescreens.
sentences.cn: 电幕上传来一阵轻微的音乐声.

sentences.en: A tinny voice issued from a speaker.
sentences.cn: 扬声器里传出了细微的声音。

sentences.en: Burining Burning away the material added to the clay leaves tinny tiny holes.
sentences.cn: 燃烧完的材料加上泥土填入小洞里.

sentences.en: He could hear the tinny sound of a radio playing a pop song.
sentences.cn: 他能听到收音机播放流行歌曲的刺耳声音。

sentences.en: He heard the tinny phonograph bleating as he walked in.
sentences.cn: 他步入室内时听到那架蹩脚的留声机在呜咽.

sentences.en: It is one of the cheapest cars on the market, with tinny bodywork.
sentences.cn: 那是市场上最廉价的汽车之一，车身用劣质金属制成。

sentences.en: Many times tinny happiness can easily drown us, but we ate so insensitive to neglect them.
sentences.cn: 很多时候细小的幸福都可以轻而易举地淹没我们, 只是我们常常出于麻木而忽略.

sentences.en: She could hear the tinny strains of a chamber orchestra.
sentences.cn: 她能听见室内管弦乐队尖细的旋律。

sentences.en: Slime festooned the walls and the place stank of blood, gore and a tinny, alien smell.
sentences.cn: 涂上泥festooned墙壁和血的地方stank,流出的血和一种锡又外国的味道.

sentences.en: The children laugh and jangle a tinny time.
sentences.cn: 孩子们大笑着闹了一会.

sentences.en: The old recording was tinny and high - pitched.
The place was almost empty . A tinny music was trickling from the telescreens.
sentences.cn: 咖啡馆几乎空空荡荡,电幕轻声呢喃着一首温柔的乐曲.

sentences.en: These sardines have a tinny flavor.
sentences.cn: 这些沙丁鱼有马口铁罐头的味道.
像金属片碰撞声的音乐

sentences.en: With the principle of mutual benefit and development TINNY actively consummate the customer - serving system.
sentences.cn: 秉承互惠互利、共图发展的原则,逐步完善客户服务体系.

words.tran_cn: 罐头的；镀锡的，包马口铁的；听装的
包以马口铁（tin的过去分词）
锡的；含锡的；像锡的；有锡味的
